verses.verse: Now the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> to Abram, <WH87> "Go <WH1980> forth from your country, <WH776> And from your relatives <WH4138> And from your father's house, <WH1004> To the land <WH776> which <WH834> I will show <WH7200> you;
And I will make <WH6213> you a great <WH1419> nation, <WH1471> And I will bless <WH1288> you, And make <WH1431> your name <WH8034> great; <WH1431> And so you shall be a blessing; <WH1293>

And I will bless <WH1288> those who bless <WH1288> you, And the one who curses <WH7043> you I will curse. <WH779> And in you all <WH3605> the families <WH4940> of the earth <WH127> shall be blessed. <WH1288>"

So Abram <WH87> went <WH1980> forth as the Lord <WH3068> had spoken <WH1696> to him; and Lot <WH3876> went <WH1980> with him. Now Abram <WH87> was seventy-five years <WH8141> old <WH1121> when he departed <WH3318> from Haran. <WH2771>

And Abram <WH87> took <WH3947> Sarai <WH8297> his wife <WH802> and Lot <WH3876> his nephew, <WH1121> <WH251> and all <WH3605> their possessions <WH7399> which <WH834> they had accumulated, <WH7408> and the persons <WH5315> which <WH834> they had acquired <WH6213> in Haran, <WH2771> and they set <WH3318> <WH1980> out for the land <WH776> of Canaan; <WH3667> thus they came <WH935> to the land <WH776> of Canaan. <WH3667>

And Abram <WH87> passed <WH5674> through <WH5674> the land <WH776> as far <WH5704> as the site <WH4725> of Shechem, <WH7927> to the oak <WH436> of Moreh. <WH4176> Now the Canaanite <WH3669> [was] then <WH227> in the land. <WH776>

And the Lord <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> to Abram <WH87> and said, <WH559> "To your descendants <WH2233> I will give <WH5414> this <WH2088> land. <WH776>" So he built <WH1129> an altar <WH4196> there <WH8033> to the Lord <WH3068> who had appeared <WH7200> to him.

Then he proceeded <WH6275> from there <WH8033> to the mountain <WH2022> on the east <WH6924> of Bethel, <WH1008> and pitched <WH5186> his tent, <WH168> with Bethel <WH1008> on the west <WH3220> and Ai <WH5857> on the east; <WH6924> and there <WH8033> he built <WH1129> an altar <WH4196> to the Lord <WH3068> and called <WH7121> upon the name <WH8034> of the Lord. <WH3068>
And Abram <WH87> journeyed <WH5265> on, continuing <WH1980> <WH5265> toward the Negev. <WH5045>

Now there was a famine <WH7458> in the land; <WH776> so Abram <WH87> went <WH3381> down <WH3381> to Egypt <WH4714> to sojourn <WH1481> there, <WH8033> for the famine <WH7458> was severe <WH3515> in the land. <WH776>

And it came <WH1961> about when <WH9201> he came <WH7126> <WH935> near <WH7126> to Egypt, <WH4714> that he said <WH559> to Sarai <WH8297> his wife, <WH802> "See <WH2009> now, <WH4994> I know <WH3045> that you are a beautiful <WH3303> woman; <WH802>

and it will come <WH1961> about when <WH3588> the Egyptians <WH4713> see <WH7200> you, that they will say, <WH559> 'This <WH2088> is his wife <WH802>'; and they will kill <WH2026> me, but they will let you live. <WH2421>

"Please <WH4994> say <WH559> that you are my sister <WH269> so <WH4616> that it may go <WH3190> well <WH3190> with me because <WH5668> of you, and that I may live <WH2421> on account <WH1558> of you."
And it came <WH1961> about when Abram <WH87> came <WH935> into Egypt, <WH4714> the Egyptians <WH4713> saw <WH7200> that the woman <WH802> was very <WH3966> beautiful. <WH3303>
And Pharaoh <WH6547>'s officials <WH8269> saw <WH7200> her and praised <WH1984> her to Pharaoh; and the woman <WH802> was taken <WH3947> into Pharaoh's house. <WH1004>

Therefore he treated <WH3190> Abram <WH87> well <WH3190> for her sake; <WH5668> and gave <WH1961> him sheep <WH6629> and oxen <WH1241> and donkeys <WH2543> and male <WH5650> and female <WH8198> servants <WH8198> and female <WH860> donkeys <WH860> and camels. <WH1581>
But the Lord <WH3068> struck <WH5060> Pharaoh <WH6547> and his house <WH1004> with great <WH1419> plagues <WH5061> because <WH5921> <WH1697> of Sarai, <WH8297> Abram's wife. <WH802>

Then Pharaoh <WH6547> called <WH7121> Abram <WH87> and said, <WH559> "What <WH4100> is this <WH2088> you have done <WH6213> to me? Why <WH4100> did you not tell <WH5046> me that she was your wife <WH802>?

"Why <WH4100> did you say, <WH559> 'She is my sister, <WH269>' so that I took <WH3947> her for my wife <WH802>? Now <WH6258> then, here <WH2009> is your wife, <WH802> take <WH3947> her and go. <WH1980>"
And Pharaoh <WH6547> commanded <WH6680> [his] men <WH376> concerning <WH5921> him; and they escorted <WH7971> him away, <WH7971> with his wife <WH802> and all <WH3605> that belonged to him.
